CORRESP 1 filename1.htm CORRESP December&nbsp;6, 2021 VIA EDGAR Division of Corporation Finance Office of Finance U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission 100 F Street, N.E. Washington, D.C. 20549 Attn: Michelle Miller Sharon Blume Tonya K. Aldave Erin Purnell &nbsp; Re: Nu Holdings Ltd. Registration Statement on Form F-1 File No.&nbsp;333-260649 Ladies and Gentlemen: Pursuant to Rule 461 under the Securities Act of 1933, as amended, Nu Holdings Ltd. (the &#147;Company&#148;), hereby requests that the effective date of the Company&#146;s Registration Statement on Form&nbsp;F-1&nbsp;(File&nbsp;No. 333-260649)&nbsp;(the &#147;Registration Statement&#148;) be accelerated by the Securities and Exchange Commission so that the Registration Statement will become effective at 2:30 p.m., Eastern Standard Time, on December&nbsp;8, 2021, or as soon as practicable thereafter. The Company hereby authorizes Byron B. Rooney and Manuel Garciadiaz of Davis Polk&nbsp;&amp; Wardwell LLP, counsel to the Company, to modify or withdraw this request for&nbsp;acceleration&nbsp;orally. By separate letter, the underwriters of the issuance of the securities being registered join in this request for acceleration. The Company requests that we be notified of such effectiveness by a telephone call to Mr.&nbsp;Rooney at +1 212 450-4658 or to Mr.&nbsp;Garciadiaz at&nbsp;+1 212 450-6095 and that such effectiveness also be confirmed in writing. Very truly yours, Nu Holdings Ltd. By: &nbsp; /s/ David V&eacute;lez Osorno &nbsp; Name: David V&eacute;lez Osorno &nbsp; Title: &nbsp;&nbsp;Chief Executive Officer
